articles.author: Morgan Meaker
articles.title: Tesla Is Suing Sweden
articles.description: Unions are boycotting Tesla’s business operations in Sweden to pressure it to sign an agreement with its workers. Now Tesla has decided to sue.
articles.content:
Tesla is suing Sweden as the carmaker hits back at an attempt by local unions to disrupt its business in an ongoing battle over workers rights.
In the lawsuit, filed Monday, Tesla says it is suing t… [+2141 chars]

articles.author: Will Shanklin
articles.title: Tesla sues Sweden for blocking license plate deliveries during labor strike
articles.description: Tesla sued Sweden’s transportation agency and postal service on Monday over a union strike blocking the company’s license plate deliveries in the country. The workers are striking to demand the non-unionized automaker sign a collective bargaining agreement, a…

articles.author: Emma Roth
articles.title: Subaru is adopting Tesla’s EV charging port as holdout numbers dwindle
articles.description: Subaru has announced that it will adopt the North American Charging Standard starting in 2025. It’s the latest carmaker to implement the NACS port popularized by Tesla.
articles.content:
Subaru is adopting Teslas EV charging port as holdout numbers dwindle
